Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: Identifying the main flow of transitions and introducing key activities described in the scenario (CR, DV, FC, etc.).

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Generalizing from the example provided in the task prompt to establish structural similarities: creating a source place, arcs between places and transitions, and a sink for marking end states.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Deducing loops for handling incomplete documents (DV to RDS) as well as fraud investigations (FC to II) that return to earlier steps.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Connecting subsequent steps linearly where no looping mechanism is required, for example, from Claim Assessment (CA) to Approval (AP), or skipping approval directly to Payment (P).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Ensuring transitions are labeled with the activity names listed in the scenario and arcs appropriately connect places as outputs and inputs based on the narrative flow of the process.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Resolving ambiguity with the sink place by reasoning that it represents the closure of the process and should remain in the final marking.
